name: Raha
greetingText: You know your Chachu adores you!
wishText: The very first star of our family, 'you'!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: I thought of sending a simple wishâ€¦
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: As the first child, you brought so much joy and happiness to all of us.
replayText: May you keep bringing smiles to everyone around you just like you did the very first day!
